mapper.select: SELECT door.id as doorId, door.door_name, door.door_img, device.status as deviceStatus, device.device_name as deviceName, type.type as deviceType FROM t_door door LEFT JOIN t_device device on door.device_id = device.id LEFT JOIN t_device_type type on device.device_type = type.id WHERE door.deleted = 0 AND door.community_id = #{value}
